website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking to save a few dollars should check out this popular dinosaur onesie from Silver Lilly.
pros: Includes dinosaur tail, spikes, teeth, and face
Available in either green or pink
Oversized style to fit most body types
cons: A few customers complained that the ankle area rode up their legs

customer_reviews.title: Apex predator of onesies. Appropriate for a black tie affair.
customer_reviews.text: This onesie is dope af. Chase the dogs around the house, get weird at the bar, stay home alone and watch documentaries about space- whatever you want. This suit gets in the world's face and screams, "I am the captain now." Comfortable like being wrapped in the flayed pelt of Lambchop and just as badass too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelby Dayton

customer_reviews.title: There is no Daniel now, only the Dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: I've had so much fun wearing this around the house and out in public, whether it's for running errands or going out. Its tail is really fun to play with too. I go around dino-smacking my sister with it sometimes xD I was having so much fun with it I didn't even notice it had pockets on the side until a few days after it arrived, so it's greatness stacked on top of functionality! It's really soft and cozy too! WARNING: Wearing the onesie for prolonged periods of time will turn you into a dinosaur. Wear at your own risk. P.S. I am 5'5 and weigh 130 lbs, and the size small fit me just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Best 30$ I have spent
customer_reviews.text: Best 30$ I have spent! It's comfortable, makes for an easy last minute costume, and is great for scaring your cat. I went with a large (i am 6ft tall) and it fits perfect in the legs and arms. The crotch does sag down, but if it didn't then it probably wouldn't look like a dinosaur. The pockets are kind of small, but good enough to fit a phone if you aren't jumping up and down on cars and thrashing a city.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas devos

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this onesie! Totally great for parties and house lounging! The size chart said I'm a large, but I'm lanky and I was worried about the arms and legs being long enough, so I ordered both an L and XL. The XL was waaay to poofy in the body and that didn't translate into longer limbs. The L was perfect, of course. So listen to the sizing chart. I expected it to be cheaply made, but it's not. It's pretty well made. I see people complaining about loose threads, but that wasn't an issue on mine. I had a couple loose threads, but I also have scissors, so I guess I'm one of the lucky ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Claydon

customer_reviews.title: RAWR!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy as hell! I am 5' 10", 170 lbs, and I got a medium. Fits loose and comfortable, love the plush material it's made out of. The pockets could be a little deeper but that's nothing major. If you want something comfy to keep you warm this winter. This is definitely it!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great costume to terrify children with or to relax at home in
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 7" but with a bit of a stomach so I purchased the large. The arms and legs fit well but there was quite a large pouch of extra cloth in the front. The legs more cut off above the ankles but I didn't mind that. My only main issue was that the buttons are too far apart so when sitting down the bottom buttons kind of stay open. Make sure to wear some clothing underneath or you'll really frighten people away! The costume is very comfortable where I wore it the entire day instead of just to a party. This was a great purchase and I would purchase another one!
customer_reviews.author: J. PardeeTop Contributor: Magic: The Gathering

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, has pockets. The legs stop mid-calf instead of going all the way down, so if it's cold outside your lower legs might get cold. Plenty of room in the waist and chest. I am 5'5" and 150lbs and the small fit with room to spare. If you are more than 5'6" you should probably choose the medium just for height purposes. Seems to be good quality, though I did find an area by the pocket where the stitches were dropped so there was a hole. I can fix it on my sewing machine without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Huling

customer_reviews.title: The fact that adult dinosaur pajamas exist is wonderful. That said
customer_reviews.text: The fact that adult dinosaur pajamas exist is wonderful. That said, overall these are even better than expected. They are made out of nice thick fleece and seem to be well constructed! My only issue with them is the length. I bought the large and they're really only long enough for someone who is no taller than 5'5" or so... definitely disappointing. The body however is extremely roomy - you could probably fit two average sized adults in it. Since you can't be too choosy when buying an adult dinasur onesie, my expectations were pretty low, so the fact that they're short wasn't a deal breaker. ;)
customer_reviews.author: HNP

customer_reviews.title: So Fluffy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Made of all fleece, so it is extremely warm and comfortable. My fiance and I got onsies for a Halloween party. I got this dinosaur one and she got a unicorn. I also volunteer in the children's ministry at church and there will be events for that. I've worn it several times and it's always a hit. The one "drawback" is the fit. The torso fits well, but the limbs are a little short. So when I wear it I have to pull the legs up below the knee and the arms up below the elbow. But would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Sieglaff

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For A Fun & Comfortable Costume!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the trash you get in the seasonal costume stores, this thing is much better made. The fabric is nice and soft, the colors are vibrant, the buttons are secure, and the sleeves/legs have that pajama cuff that keeps them from sagging/riding. What more could you ask for? Already wore it once all night and I plan on using it again... and unlike the costume-in-a-plastic-bag things I plan on keeping it. It's really comfy and I seems like it will last for quite a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Corky

customer_reviews.title: How do I love thee, let me count the ways...
customer_reviews.text: 1 - fits super comfy (a bit loose as described) 2- perfect for a chilly halloween evening. especially if the party includes outdoor activities. 3 - got TONS of compliments 4 - did i mention it's comfy? i have totally worn this around the house in a non-halloween setting and i'm not ashamed. i only have a couple complaints that are really not complaints. - i wish the legs went further down. they taper a bit and if you're not prepared with the proper socks you could get some chilly ankles. - the tail is extremely liked by dogs.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I already have the inflatable T-Rex costume, but it can be impractically large to wear in confined spaces, vision is limited, batteries wear out, and it's crazy hot inside. Then I saw this one. I needed something to wear for answering the door for Halloween. This looked comfy and functional. And indeed it is. I am 5'6", 155 lbs and M fits nice and loose, but not overly baggy. It is soft and seems well enough constructed for the price. It is very warm - so I will be dressing lightly underneath. I also bought green socks and the dino feet slippers to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mouse

customer_reviews.title: It is SUPER warm, thick fleece
customer_reviews.text: I got the large for a 155lb, 5'7" man. If you dont get it one size up the arms and legs will be short. It is SUPER warm, thick fleece, not recommended for warm weather. My baby loves it! Hood part could be a little deeper, but look as as expected.. love the tail!
customer_reviews.author: Mimilee

customer_reviews.title: Rawr!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a 27th birthday gift for my bestie. She loved it so much. It's supposed to be loose and only comes down to just below your knee as a heads up. But I was able to help her realize her dream of being a dinosaur. Pretty awesome if I say so myself!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome costume!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I am 5'1" and 120lbs, and I ordered a small. It fit perfectly! I was very impressed with the quality and it is very comfortable. I am super excited to go out and wear this! It is freaking awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: I adore this pajama set! I originally bought it to wear as a costume on Halloween and was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the pajamas. For example, this pajama set is extremely soft,comfortable and well made. The hood and tail really make the outfit and I intend to use it again for other events (great to dance in).I highly recommend this product to anyone who needs a fun, quick costume or just wants super comfy pj's!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my virtual learners
customer_reviews.text: My kids are doing virtual learning and asked to make up their own school uniform so this was their choice. (no worries virtual platform where other students cannot see them so no distractions) The size small fit my large size 11 year old as expected him being 5'1 in height and 125lbs. He had plenty of space and I know it was supposed to be baggy. Product as described.
customer_reviews.author: Adams

customer_reviews.title: Order by HEIGHT not by what size you wear in clothes
customer_reviews.text: Trust the instructions and order by height. The fit is generous enough to accommodate even curvy girls easily. My teenaged daughter is adorable in her "Dan and Phil" onesie.
customer_reviews.author: T. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Roar!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband, who is 5'10 and 160 lbs. The medium fit perfectly. He plans to wear it raving and night skiing. It's pretty adorable with the tail and everything. Do make sure you're wearing something underneath -- the space between buttons is not insignificant. ;)
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Legs are short, but fun costume!
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and comfortable. Brings a smile to everyone's faces. I purchased a Medium for myself. 10 year old nephew asked if he could have it when I grow out of it (LOL, kiddo, i've been shrinking...that's not gonna happen!) but I did one better - I bought a small for him for Christmas. Keep in mind, the legs are cut short - so if that's an issue, order a size up and deal with feeling like you're wearing parachute/harem pants.
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: #Dino4Lyfe
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3" and around 130, the costume fits pretty well but a bit longer than the calf-length image shown for the product. It is a nice (warm) fleece and the buttons and face are sewn well! The inside of the hood (red part) is a nice soft t-shirt material. The cuffs of both the arms and the legs have are similar to the cuffs of a hoodie, so they are tight enough to keep the costume from sliding up/down, but not constricting! I was just planning on using this for Halloween, but now I'm going to wear it to a bunch of things because it is way better quality than I was expecting! :D
customer_reviews.author: Kate S.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality! My boyfriend is 5’8” ~180lbs and I am 5’6” ~135lbs and the medium fits both of us. He ordered me the pink one after I got the green for him but it came from a different company and the quality was no where near as nice as this one so we sent it back and ordered this one in pink as well. So nice to lounge around in! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fuzzy like a blanket
customer_reviews.text: We got these for a mardi gras costume. We're going to modify them with LED lights and other add-ons. I'm also going to add some sew on snaps to the hood so it fits tight and snug for good peripheral vision while marching. We're both 5'8" tall, ordered the large and the arms come to the wrist and the legs come all the way down to the ankles. It's very warm, very. So let's hope it's cold outside. The middle section is super baggy if you have a tummy, it will totally fit. If you're taller than 5'10", I would go with an XL, but if you're slim XL will be very baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for a great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Prepare yourself for some cuteness!!! This is adorable fits great! The style has the crotch portion lower so it is baggy and roomy. It has a tail on the back and is warm. I am soo geeked to wear it for Halloween here in MI!!! I even wear it around the house, neighbors and passer-bys found it amusing when I went out to get the mail in it. ONLY thing I would fix or change is I would put a zipper on it. Buttons are not my favorite and my seat belt catches on the top one.
customer_reviews.author: KT.S

customer_reviews.title: low quality/sloppy work
customer_reviews.text: the size fit too big and the quality is extremely low and there are holes/loose strings all over. the face on the hood looks sloppy. my friends ordered the same but their onesies are way better quality and i loved it. i don't know why mine came in poor quality/sloppy. im very disappointed and don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: san francisco

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and cozy onesie
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and cozy onesie. I wore it to a onesie party and everyone loved it. The tail is the Best part. I'm a 5'7 curvier woman and it fit well even with my bigger thighs and butt. I'd recommend wearing shorts underneath it though since the inside stitching can get itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: Warm costume
customer_reviews.text: I gave this costume 3 stars because i wish the legs went all the way to my ankle. Looks like im gunna be wearing boots to go trick or treating with my son so my ankles dont freeze. It would also be nice if this had a zipper on the butt like my sons dinosaur costume(thats the same as this one) so i could actually use the bathroom while wearing it. Overall quality is good just could have had more thinking go into the process. Its warm besides my ankles and i can layer under it! Which is needed as it almost always snows on halloween where i live.
customer_reviews.author: deborah fisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2, 250 and the extra large fit very well. Just oversized enough to be comfortable but not swimming in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and comfortable, too
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son got this for a Halloween costume. He loves it. We live in South Florida, so it was rather hot, but he still wore it. It appears to be of good quality, and stood up to a lot of wear and tear. The only thing I don't like so much is that it has to be hand washed and line dried. I washed it in the machine on delicate cycle, and hung it to dry. It seems to be just fine, but takes awhile to dry.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfBoys

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: Cute, warm for a Midwest fall, fits as advertised, but most importantly hides the pizza dough pouch that has now permanently taken residence on my lower abdomen after multiple kids. Looking for an outfit you can layer with? It’s roomy enough to wear a coat or sweatshirt with but still warm and cozy all on it’s own. Think Snuggie with front buttons. Can’t recommend this product enough. Originally purchased to be a dinosaur for Halloween with my kids, has now turned into go-to weekend outfit.
customer_reviews.author: beetz

customer_reviews.title: Does not give you Godzilla superpowers
customer_reviews.text: This suit will make you want to stomp on your neighbors' cars while screeching like Godzilla. You should not do that. Go to a different part of town to rampage. You like your neighbors,for God(zilla)'s sake! I'm 6' tall, and I was worried the XL would be a bit short in the legs. No worries! They reach to my ankles. I'll just wear socks to complete the look.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Happy Christmas Dinorsaur!
customer_reviews.text: When my husband and I decided to randomly wear animal onesies for Christmas this year, I picked this and am so glad I did. Comfy, warm, and fit so perfectly! I even wore it to sleep, like real PJ’s, all through Christmas break. :) Being short and petite, I almost never shop for clothes online because usually everything is too long on me, but this was a total win!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Same quality as expensive kigus
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! It has almost the same quality as my kigu from kigurumi. com that I paid over twice as much for. I’m 6’ and the xl is PLENTY long enough. It survived in the washing machine on cold in delicate cycle just fine even though it says hand wash only. Overall very pleased and excited to use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Pajamas and a Costume
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are a great costume combo which fits perfectly. The unit is very comfortable and cozy without overheating you at any time. I originally thought the tail would be annoying when sitting or laying down but it is stuffed just to the right amount where it is not noticeably annoying in those conditions. I bought this for Halloween but now I find myself wearing this around the house and to bed on a frequent basis. I know it might sound weird to dress up as a dinosaur for no reason but it is very comfortable and I justify it as wearing pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Dino time baby!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever seen the smile of an innocent child as they realize that dinosaurs are real and they can be part of the herd?! If not, then get this product. Sure it's not cashmere, but c'mon. That's not why you're getting this. So get it already. Maybe it lasts a month, maybe a year. But those smiles!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Lovely onesie.
customer_reviews.text: Despite my stone-faced expression, I love this onesie! Very soft, comfortable, and warm. The fabric colors are nice and vibrant and the stitching is nice and strong. Well-made piece of clothing. The sizing is a bit difficult to figure out, but reading other reviews should help. I ordered a small and it fit me quite well, however I normally wear medium sizes. Overall, I would reccomend this for anyone wanting to look fierce and comfy at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Hey There

customer_reviews.title: Good costume
customer_reviews.text: This is a real good costume; it looked good, had a comfortable fit, pockets are convenient, it kept me warm while I was outside, and it was going for a reasonable price. That said, pockets could be deeper so things don't fall out, and a zipper would be a little nicer than buttons. Overall, I am happy with my purchase, and I would reccomend this costume/brand to someone who was in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja-Review

customer_reviews.title: fits a fat man.
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'1 and 300lbs. I was worried about this not fitting. However, I was able to fit into with zero issues and still had some room for height and weight. The buttons were spaced perfectly and did not have any issues with people seeing my underclothes. My only complaint, this is made out of a felt like material and it is extremely hot.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful_Dad2

customer_reviews.title: Bought these as a funny Xmas gift for my 6’4” brother
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a funny Xmas gift for my 6’4” brother. It fits him great, super soft. He loves it. His favorite part is that he has a nervous little dog that likes to lay in his lap and peak out of the pajamas while they watch tv.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I grabbed a medium and they fit perfectly. They foot cuffs around the ankle perfectly and the crotch area is super low and roomy. I wore this in the cold with just a T-Shirt and shorts and they kept me warm for 8 hours. I would highly recommend this onesie.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rex/Fornite alternative costume
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his pajama/costume rex fortnite!! The fabric is nice and quilted for cold weather, not your typical thin party city fabric. My son is 10 yrs old and bigger than your typical boys. The reviews were very helpful in choosing his size. A small was a perfect size to his height and weight. The chart is on point if in dought. Overall he fit just right with plenty of room to move around and im sure he will still fit for next year if he chooses to but knowing kids these days, he will want something else.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: So I do love this thing
customer_reviews.text: So I do love this thing, but wanted to put in my two cents here: I ordered an extra large because I'm a big guy, but the sizes seem to be only based on height. I weigh about two-fifty and stand five ten, and I'm swimming in it. I just didn't see any reviews from big people saying if a large or medium fit them. I would absolutely order again, but next time I'll go for the large instead of the extra large
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dino suits for all!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is great. Perfect for Halloween and I was able to order this one plus the women’s version for myself and similar dog versions for our pups. My only caution is to expect it to fit big (it’s a baggy onesie with a drop crotch) but the legs are short so be prepared. Since they are short, if you have large calfs, it may be tight where they stop. Otherwise I think we looked pretty cute!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TIMES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product do much, the quality is stunning, the fun times you will have i am literally in love with this and the tail doesn't hurt even to sit on. I would recommend this because it came in all nice nothing has ripped yet at all. And again please only get the size you wear not a size higher as it may be to baggy unless you like it baggy
customer_reviews.author: shadow

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Used as a costume on a short Halloween fun run; ran about 2 miles. It was very comfortable, even to run in with other athletic clothes underneath. It is big and baggy by design. It seems fairly well made for the price. I wasn’t planning on keeping it but I think I will now. Would buy it or a different mode by the same company again.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Day

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item so I could wear it for Halloween but wanted to also have something I could wear after Halloween as well. It was a big hit with everyone at the party. Now everyone wants to get a onesie for Christmas. I am 5'3, weigh a little over 200lbs, and mostly have my weight in my stomach but this outfit was more than accommodating. It was so warm and comfortable that at times I forgot I was wearing it. Customer service was also very helpful. I recommend this company and the outfit!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: so it's a good idea to have a warm costume if you plan ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Halloween. We live in Wisconsin, so it's a good idea to have a warm costume if you plan to be outside! He's 6'3", medium build with a little tummy, but it fit him without a problem. It would be more convenient to have a zipper, but, hey, the price was right, and it's kind of adorable to see a grown up man in a dinosaur onesie. It was perfect for meeting out little nieces and nephews for Halloween at the zoo.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Very good!!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and warm!! Definitely a good costume for a cold Halloween!! Fires length wise as expected im 5'2" and got a medium i believe and length is great but size it is big. I'm 9 months pregnant and still have room!! So if you're short but skinny keep that in mind!! But im very pleased with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelders

customer_reviews.title: Cool PJ's for a costume party
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a onesie pub crawl. Needless to say, the item did it's job. I am 6'1" and this was a tad big on me, but no issues. I was able to wear shorts and a t-shirt underneath with no problem. In warm weather conditions, this would be very HOT. But could be just what you need if you don't have blankets on a cold night.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Hilariously adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Might seem a little pricy initially, but I can say it was definitely worth the money. Costume is well made, super soft and warm. As for sizing, I'm 5'7" and normally wear an XL in unisex and a 2x in woman's clothing, so I ordered an XL. And let me tell you it is definitely a little baggy on me. But I like to wear it that way anyway. Chances are, a size L would have been perfect. I also ordered the matching paw slippers and they definitely complete the costume. Shipping was also relatively fast for me, esp since I live in a place where shipping on average from mainland companies is 3-4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kehaulani

customer_reviews.title: Great cold weather pajamas or costume!
customer_reviews.text: Great pamjamas/costume! The fit is very similar to photo, large and bagy. Material seems durable. It's great when it's chilly, but does get warm when it not. I highly recommend for cold weather pajamas or costume.
customer_reviews.author: Dmanning

customer_reviews.title: Life finds a way
customer_reviews.text: I know the sizing is so hard to gauge, so here's my experience: I'm a 5' 7" lady and my weight doesn't matter but the fact that I have boobs does, and the medium was comfortable. That said, all of my height is in my legs, so the ankles were a smidge too short. I might consider buying large if I get another one, because I am now ALL abut the onesie life.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth It
customer_reviews.text: A couple of friends and I bought several of this to dress up for a team event, and I have no complaints. The material is nice, it fits well, the buttons are spaced a good distance apart, and it's not heavy. The only problem was that friend of mine was sliding around and ripped up the knees, but no other problems, just be careful of how rough you are with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Paterna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter absolutely loves dinosaurs and this has become a favorite of hers. It fits her well (for an adult size), and she loves to wear it! It has been washed three times (we put it in a laundry mesh bag) and it washed perfectly. Seems to be good quality! Everything has held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Hysterical!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her brother for his birthday and it is hysterical. They have a really random sense of humor and he was cracking us up. Bonus, it's comfortable and fits great. He's a 17 year old, 195 lb boy and the large worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great pajamas, but short in the leg
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable material, and it's got pockets! Ordered a size small for my girlfriend who's barely 5' tall and 100lbs soaking wet. She's been practically living in them since she opened the package! The only thing I didn't care for was the leg length. Even with her small frame, the legs only go half way down her calf. The rest of the pajamas are pleasantly oversized leaving plenty of room to be cozy all day long, so if I'd have ordered anything larger, she'd be swimming in the material and the crotch of the pajamas would be dragging on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: w00t

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for my husband and I to wear with our toddler for Halloween as she was also dressing up as a dinosaur and it was awesome! We spent the entire day in our dino pjs including grocery shopping and stopping by the bank! Many heads turned! Got lots of laughs!! Worth every cent!! 10 out of 10 will wear grocery shopping again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Embracing My Inner T-Rex
customer_reviews.text: I love these jammies so much. They're super comfortable and I like to run around my apartment and yell "Rawr" when I put them on. I wore them to a costume party and my friends were jealous. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit it, all three of us had to join the cool kid's club and get one. Familysaurus Rex loves these, and we're highly amused... and comfy spending family time in these. Plus they have pockets!!!
customer_reviews.author: jamie lee chernick

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Outfit to Rampage Around Town
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this onesie is supposed to go all the way down to my ankles, because it doesn't, but I don't care. It's doing a cute 3/4 type deal on my calves, so I roll those suckers up to my knees and rock the short onesie. Super comfortable, if I'm running around destroying a city or just chilling on my couch. It is warm, as are most onesies, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: It was fine. As described. Nice and comfy for Halloween. Not sure how it would be as pajamas with that giant tail getting in the way - but I only purchased to match my son for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great onesie!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second time purchasing this onesie! I love this product-it’s warm, fits well, and is made of durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Fink

customer_reviews.title: So warm and fun
customer_reviews.text: This arrived within a few days and is super warm and well made. Size large fits a lean slender 5'11" guy. His ankles are a little exposed but its very roomy around the torso. Nice forest green color and vibrant scales with tail add a cute and fun touch.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: 6'6" 275lb XL fits fine.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because I'm crazy tall and built like a linebacker. The legs look kind of like joggers but this fits fine and is a great no hassle Halloween costume. 10/10 would Dino again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Teti

customer_reviews.title: Greatest purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable thing I’ve ever worn. As it’s unisex I decided to go down a size and there is still plenty of room. It has a bit of a drop-crotch effect that I actually prefer so that the tail doesn’t get in the way of sitting. Easier to move around in than I expected. Also, a conversational piece. Friends seem to prefer me as a dinosaur, so I guess it’s a win all around. I guarantee you will not regret!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Honestly the best onesie I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: These onesies are amazing!! My whole family decided to buy these as a fun Christmas morning pajama party! The material has a soft felt feeling and is definitely very cozy and great for those cold winter nights. The XL definitely runs true to size in all three colors: green, pink, and brown. Each family member picked out a different color and it fit all of us amazing, even 6’4 and 6’2 dad and big brother. In the end we even ended up buying the dog a special doggy dinosaur costume too so we could all match!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend and he loves it! He is about 6 foot and 180 pounds. He definitely has a lot of wiggle room but he prefers it that way. Is the right length for his height as well. Already washed it and material held up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Potts

customer_reviews.title: Fun to wear with my grandson!
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly warm, cozy and fun outfit to wear but was especially fun to wear with my 5-year old grandson last Halloween! Wish I had purchased one that zipped but this was just as fine. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: PBarker77

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fun
customer_reviews.text: There’s lots of room so you can jump up and down without the outfit riding up anywhere unwanted. Perfect event outfit for kicks and giggles. Don’t mind falling asleep in it because it’s so soft.
customer_reviews.author: JentleBiz

customer_reviews.title: probably the best drunk purchase i've made all year
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and appearance for the price. Really comfortable, actually. Bought it hammered but it's hilarious so i'll probably wear it for halloween and all winter. If it helps with height/weight comparison, as of writing this I'm ~5' 9", 145 lbs. and got the medium size, though weight won't really matter since I'm pretty sure you'd have to be reeeeally big to even stretch it. fits just right
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B.

customer_reviews.title: cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: i'm 5'10" and 160 lbs, so the medium fits fine but it's a bit short on my legs. will totally work for walking around our cold neighborhood on Halloween
customer_reviews.author: chaddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'0 or 5'1 and a little on the heavy side, and I looked through the reviews and finally decided on getting a large and I'm glad I did. The onesie fit perfectly and I love it and it's also very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed to get compliments at Starbucks or Taco Bell!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a tad kooky and like to wear stuff like this like normal clothing. Wish it were a zipper, had deeper pockets and a drawstring for the hood but this seems to be par the course with onesies.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! The fabric is incredibly soft and warm and I love that it has pockets! I am about 5'3 and typically wear a size 10 (US); I bought a medium and it is very baggy, but that's how I wanted it to fit. The legs fit to my ankles, but would probably be higher on a taller person. I am so excited to wear this as my Halloween costume for many years to come! And it's honestly comfortable enough that I would wear it around the house on cold days too!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made, fun costume. Would like the legs to have been longer, as they don't reach your ankles. quality is superb though!
customer_reviews.author: gone fishing 5478

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute—wish it were a zipper though. It’s extra warm having to wear enough clothes inside so that there isn’t any indecency. Soft and cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and soft, cute tail
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5 and I got the medium in the green. The fabric is extremely warm and feels soft, but I haven't washed it yet so it may feel less soft afterwards. Docking a star because there were a three loose threads when I first took it out of the package. My arms were perfect length, legs were a bit short, has a drop crotch. Tail is a good long length and back spikes are soft enough that I don't notice them when I sit. Overall, not a bad onesie for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and around 100 pounds and ordered the small, and it fits perfectly. Not too big, but still baggy. The product came in perfect condition and is made of super soft material. It even has pockets! The last onesie I ordered was a gloomy bear and sitting was uncomfortable because the short tail stuck out, but there's no issue with this onesie. Comfortable for lounging as well as being around the house/public. Kigurimi shop would normally charge $60 for this exact same outfit so this price was awesome! Very satisfied!z
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a kickball tournament as our team theme was dinosaurs. It was great. It was pretty cold that day and with my layers I ended up being warm most of the time. I also won best costume! I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Speed1996

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the package, we thought that we had received a used product as the package had been opened and re-taped, and the fabric had a large stain. However, the tags were still intact and the item was otherwise in good shape. After a regular wash the stain was gone and the "costume" was great. We would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gaston

customer_reviews.title: I am a Dinosaur Rwar Mofo!
customer_reviews.text: It is deadass mad comfy!!!! No issues with it. I am 5ft 1 and I weigh about 165. I got a medium and it was cool. I am happy with my purchase. The tail is mad cute. This is dope for a little gathering where everyone bout to get lit as friends with their onsie. hahahha! I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pac

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This suit was exactly what I was looking for to attend a dragon themed event. The fabric is lightweight and I don't think it will be too warm. I think they run large. I ordered a large for myself and an extra large for my husband but the cut is very generous and a medium probably would have been fine. But it's all in fun and so the size doesn't really matter. Its difficult to tell from a photo exactly what you are ordering and this product was better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Great product and personally I don't mind it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and personally I don't mind it was a bit larger than what I expected, would rather have more room inside the onesie than having it very tight and restricting movement :D
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: OH MY FREAKING GOSH!!! I LOVE THIS SOOO MUCH! I bought this to wear to a Dino themed 1st bday party and to double as a costume for Halloween night on a cruise I’m going on. SO happy I bought it. It’s a 2x that fits baggy the buttons aren’t the pop kind so you do have to unbutton about 3 of the buttons to put it on. I have big boobs so it does open a bit around the bob area but other then that I love it. One of the tooth’s were a little bent but it’s not too bad. Oh and it’s pretty thick and warm!!!
customer_reviews.author: BrittBrat

customer_reviews.title: Rocked it on the slopes
customer_reviews.text: Great dino onesie! I wore this skiing and got lots of complements! The tail is by far the best part. The materials and construction are solid. It is a button fly down the whole length so make sure you wear something underneath it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lafond

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well and Warm for an outdoor costume party.
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect, last minute Halloween costume. It was comfortable and warm. I am a tall and I always worry when I buy stuff online won't fit correctly because of short arms or legs. This fit perfectly and allowed me to even layer underneath.
customer_reviews.author: L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Little big but warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a gag gift but he wears it when it's super cold and it always makes me laugh. It's a little loose but comfortable. He's 160 pounds 5'8. I should of gotten a smaller size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Made well and comfy, but sizing is a bit off
customer_reviews.text: The materials for the onesie are soft and very comfortable, and well made. My only complaint is that the sizing is off. I'm 5'9" so I ordered a large to avoid a very baggy onesie and ended up with one that goes about 3-4 inches high above my ankle. Not a deal breaker but can be a little uncomfortable as it squeezes my leg. So if you are 5'9" go for the x-large. Other than that it's super comfy and looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this, like other people have said it's super ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this, like other people have said it's super warm and comfy, the design is such that it runs large (the torso area is big and long). For the price this is a great deal, going to wear it for halloween and then as PJ's, they warm me up really fast. One thing to note if it matters to you, you have to basically step out of it to use the washroom, tail and legs could get in the way in some scenarios. All in all, I love it and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: weirdly shaped
customer_reviews.text: it’s uncomfortable to walk in, it’s so baggy it just drags along and makes you feel like your pants are sagging
customer_reviews.author: Liana Elola

customer_reviews.title: Fits an looks good
customer_reviews.text: Fits great I got a small I'm a shorter dude an it's a little baggy but as to be expected happy with the buy
customer_reviews.author: Brandon dean

customer_reviews.title: Fits my giant self
customer_reviews.text: Check it, I’m 6’5”, bought this as a Halloween costume and it worked out perfectly! People didn’t know if I was a crocodile or a dinosaur so I became the Croco-saur. Buy it, love it, live it!
customer_reviews.author: Nostaw90

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Looks more like a dragon or gater than a dinosaur, but my son still loved it. Very soft fleece fabric, I've washed it many times and it's held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Momto9

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was SO Awesome! My husband wore it for Holloween. He works with kids and they loved it! It was a little short as he was 6'4" but it was still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aleah R.

customer_reviews.title: great, but weird fit
customer_reviews.text: So comfy, great costume. Wear it as PJs! a little large but then also short on the legs? weird fit
customer_reviews.author: beabillionaire

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our teenage son. He loved dinosaurs when a kid. Much to our surprise he wears it all the time and loves it. Says it is super comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll be missed
customer_reviews.text: Pushed through a weekend riding trip with the boys like a champ. He ended up getting burnt pretty bad and his tail got stuck in the chain so we had to put him down. RIP
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was the scariest person at the party. I probably scarred a dozen kids for life. Excellent fit. Excellent effect.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Cearley

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for your tail so it doesn't get caught in the car door
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and cozy. My daughter says it keeps her super warm and looks really cute. She's around 5 ft and I bought a small. Fits just great
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: The tail is always in the way.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable thing I own. It came to fit a little bigger than expected however that’s not a bad thing since the extra space keeps in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Hardy Johnson

product_meta.title: Silver Lilly Unisex Adult Pajamas - Plush One Piece Cosplay Animal Dinosaur Costume
feature_bullets: DETAILS - The adorable and eye-catching animal onesie designs all feature a hood with eyes, teeth, and nose for full effect. Matching tails and chest designs help complete your ultimate cosplay look! Match with a pair of animal slippers (not included) for your next pajama party.

COZY - A special blend of comfort and fun, these plush materials are soft to the touch and will keep you warm during those cold winter months. The button up closure allows you to quickly get dressed while the loose fit gives you the flexibility to easily wear over your existing clothes or jacket.

VERSATILE - Loose fitting materials allow you the flexibility of movement while maintaining style and comfort. The fun and whimsical designs will make sure you get noticed at your next furry convention or party. Carry your remote or keys around with you thanks to two front pockets.

CLEANING - Take good care of your new onesie to prevent fading! The comfortable polyester material is recommended to be hand washed and laid flat to dry. If ironing is required, it is recommended to do so on Low heat only.

SIZING - Model pictured is 6' and 150 lbs, wearing size Large. Available in sizes Small through X-Large fitting adult heights from 4'9" to 6'2" - Sizes are approximate as follows: Small fits 4'9" - 5'4"; Medium fits 5'1" - 5'9"; Large fits 5'5" - 6'; X-Large fits 5'9" - 6'4".
